title: Northern Ireland Housing Statistics 2017-18: Energy
description: The Northern Ireland Housing Statistics report is an annual compendium of statistics containing information on a range of areas relating to housing. The report is divided into sections covering: Energy.
datasetNotes: Data on this page identified as an Excel file entitled "Northern Ireland Housing Statistics 2017-18 Section 2 Tables - Energy" under heading "Documents".
sizingNotes: Compendia of 5 tables with no obvious commonality.
notes: Source: NIHE, NI House Condition Survey
